p: To be included in further analysis, litters had to meet minimum inclusion criteria: Each litter had to have ≥ 3 pups, ≥ 1 male, and ≥ 1 female. After application of inclusion criteria, n = 6, 4, 5, 4, and 4 unique litters; and n = 9, 11, 9, 10, and 10 individual animals from vehicle, 1.5, 15, 150, and 1,500 μg/kg/day treatment groups, respectively ( Supplementary Table 1).
